DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective Phase I exploratory study determine effect mipomersen hepatic production apolipoprotein-B ( apo B ) low density lipoprotein ( VLDL ) compare baseline level . The study consist Screening Period , 1-week Run-in Period establish stable diet , approximate 11-week Treatment Period Placebo Mipomersen , 25-week Post-Treatment Follow-up Period . The total duration give subject 's participation approximately 40 week .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Effects Mipomersen Lipid Lipoprotein Metabolism Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Nonpregnant , nonlactating , surgically sterile , postmenopausal , abstinent , subject partner compliant acceptable contraceptive regimen 4 week prior Screening willing remain compliant contraceptive regimen throughout treatment 25 week last investigational product dose Body weight > 50 kg , body mass index ( BMI ) ≤38 kg/m2 , stable weight ( i.e. , within 5 % mean body weight ) > 8 week prior Screening Fasting TG level ≤170 mg/dL , fast serum blood glucose ≤115 mg/dL , HbA1c ≤6.5 % Presence clinically significant abnormal laboratory profile , physical exam , vital sign , ECGs History presence clinically significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , hematologic , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , neurologic , infectious , psychiatric disease Malignancy ( exception basal squamous cell carcinoma skin adequately treat recurrence > 1 year ) Screening History relevant food and/or drug allergy ( i.e. , allergy heparin significant food allergy could preclude stable diet ) The subject receive prescription lipidlowering therapy statin , bile acid sequestrants , niacin/nicotinic acid , and/or fibrates overthecounter ( OTC ) fish oil , flaxseed , red rice nutrient supplement might affect lipid level The subject unwilling limit alcohol consumption entire duration study The subject smoke > 5 cigarette per day
